FuncDef: This command specifies the neighbor's IP address only on a multi-chassis APS where the working and protect circuits are configured on different routers. When the value the neighbor IP address is set to 0.0.0.0, this implies that the APS group is configured as a single-chassis APS group.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the neighbor's IP address only on a multi-chassis APS where the working and protect circuits are configured on different routers. The node should be connected with a direct interface to ensure optimum fail-over time.
